subject: Horse Racing
Breeding of Animals
Horses
lead_paragraph: Long before Eight Belles shattered her front ankles and was euthanized on the track on May 3, the industry had conceded that American racehorses were less sound than ever.
snippet: Long before Eight Belles shattered her front ankles and was euthanized on the track on May 3, the industry had conceded that American racehorses were less sound than ever.
